descriptions: Student does not attempt the reading or demonstrates no understanding of the text.
Student attempts the reading but struggles significantly with comprehension, even with substantial scaffolding. The text selected is far below the expected complexity band.
Student demonstrates limited comprehension of the text, requiring considerable scaffolding. The text may be slightly below the expected complexity band.
Student comprehends the text with some scaffolding. The text is within the grades 11-CCR text complexity band, but the student struggles with more nuanced aspects.

Student independently comprehends the text at the grades 11-CCR text complexity band proficiently. Minor areas of misunderstanding may be present, but do not significantly impede overall comprehension.

Student independently and proficiently comprehends literary nonfiction at the high end of the grades 11-CCR text complexity band, demonstrating a nuanced understanding of complex ideas and rhetorical strategies.
Student provides no analysis or interpretation of the text.
Student attempts to analyze the text but offers only superficial or inaccurate interpretations.
Student identifies some key ideas but struggles to develop a coherent interpretation. Analysis is often unsupported by textual evidence.
Student provides a basic analysis of the text, supported by some textual evidence. Interpretation may be somewhat simplistic or incomplete.
Student offers a well-supported analysis and interpretation of the text, demonstrating an understanding of the author's purpose and key themes.

Student provides a sophisticated and insightful analysis of the text, demonstrating a deep understanding of complex themes, rhetorical strategies, and the author's purpose. Interpretation is nuanced and supported by compelling textual evidence.
Student does not use evidence from the text.
Student attempts to use evidence, but the selections are irrelevant or inaccurately cited.
Student uses some evidence from the text, but it is often weak or poorly explained.
Student provides relevant evidence from the text to support claims, but the connection between evidence and analysis is not always clear.
Student effectively uses textual evidence to support analysis and interpretation, explaining the connection between evidence and claims.
Student skillfully integrates textual evidence to support a sophisticated and nuanced analysis, demonstrating a clear and compelling understanding of the text.
